Reference

Themes

These are themes. They are *quite* themey.

theme_readthedown()

ggplot2 theme to fit the readthedown Rmd format

theme_tadaa()

Official tadaa-data ggplot2 theme (for now)

theme_tadaark()

Official dark tadaa-data ggplot2 theme (for now)

theme_trakt()

Theme Matching trakt.tv (Dark Knight Mode)

Fonts

Bundled fonts and import helpers

import_lato() font_lato font_lato_bold font_lato_light font_lato_thin font_lato_semibold font_lato_heavy

Import Lato font for use in charts

import_source_sans() font_ssp font_ssp_semibold font_ssp_bold font_ssp_black font_ssp_light font_ssp_extralight

Import Source Sans font for use in charts

This package

tadaathemes-package

tadaathemes: Neato 'ggplot2' Themes
